institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal Human Resources Development Support Project Operation Rules/Article 17 (Completion Report)
contents: Article 17 (Completion Report) ① Supporting companies must submit a learning organization support project completion report and project completion report to the head of the affiliated organization within 14 days from the end of the project period. However, the type of learning network activity is submitted by the council., ② Upon receiving the completion report, the head of the affiliated institution must check whether the registered information in the subsidy management system pursuant to Article 27 is appropriate and conduct the final settlement of the subsidy.
